[sameSite?](./next-context.cookieattributes.samesite.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

'strict' \| 'lax' \| 'none' \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Asserts that a cookie must not be sent with cross-origin requests, providing some protection against cross-site request forgery attacks (CSRF)

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A Boolean indicating if the cookie transmission requires a secure protocol (https). Defaults to false.
